overview: In "Storm Realm Survival" the Teku and the Metal Maniacs shoot through  the portal into an enormous arena of clouds.  It's an electrically charged,  inhospitable racecourse even before they meet up with the evil Racing  Drones.  The Drones proceed to give the other racers a hard lesson in  getting, and winning races with, Accele-ChargerTM car enhancers.  Enjoy the ride and be sure to look for all 3 episodes of AcceleRacersrM  Movie 1; exclusively on DVDs included with HyperPodTM vehicles! Each sold  separately, subject to availability.
title: Hot Wheels - delete
